summary: The code uses pandoc to convert HTML files (example_docstring, processed, processed_article and processed_index) to DOCX format. The output file names are specified with their corresponding extensions (.docx), and the "-o" flag specifies the output filename.

details.comment: The code uses pandoc to convert HTML files (example_docstring, processed, processed_article and processed_index) to DOCX format. The output file names are specified with their corresponding extensions (.docx), and the "-o" flag specifies the output filename.
details.content:
pandoc -o original_example_docstring.docx html/example_docstring.html
pandoc -o processed.docx html/processed.html
pandoc -o processed_article.docx html/processed_article.html
pandoc -o processed_index.docx html/processed_index.html
